headline: CNN Newsroom
subHeadline: The Western U.S. Celebrates the Fourth of July. Aired 12-1a ET

utterances.speaker: VICTOR BLACKWELL, CNN ANCHOR
utterances.sentences: Look at the skyline. I mean, the shot we took at the top, it's just beautiful. I can tell you that the families, as predicted, have filled in on the seawall.We've been watching the traffic come across the bridge on the Coronado Island all night. The boats are in the water. They've calmed the music over at that - that band shell, the amphitheater you see across the bay. Everybody now sitting and waiting for the biggest fire -- fireworks show on the West Coast to begin.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: It is going to happen, but you know, we don't have it yet. So I figured -- I said, Victor, should we do a little fun thing, a little wildness? And this is all we got for you. I know.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: These are the -- the pre-show.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: It's not as good -- trust me -- as the show. The show is incredible, and the weather is incredible. You heard a little bang there. I don't think it's --

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Here we go.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: It's starting! It's starting!

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: This is the Big Bay Boom. And also performing now, Goo Goo Dolls.

utterances.speaker: JOHN RZEZNIK, LEAD SINGER, GOO GOO DOLLS
utterances.sentences: Come on, people!(MUSIC: GOO GOO DOLLS, "SLIDE")

utterances.speaker: RZEZNIK
utterances.sentences: Come on, sing it with me. There you go!(MUSIC: GOO GOO DOLLS, "SLIDE")

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: OK, we're mesmerized. We don't even want to joke around. Like this is gorgeous. And there's so many different varieties.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: It's so beautiful and well-coordinated. So you just listened to the Goo Goo Dolls, and we've been watching this show the entire time.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: And there are some designs that we're seeing for the first time.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Yes.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: We saw a smiley face in there, as well. I mean, this is just beautiful.Now, this show is launched from four barges here on the bay, and they are synchronized. So everybody's kind of getting the same show along the sea wall. It's beautiful. It's beautiful.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Look at that. We did see one of your waterfalls.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: We did see a waterfall, right to start.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Look at that one!

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: You know what's great? And I know we're seeing more drones as part of shows. I love that we can feel it.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Yes, right.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: That you can feel the boom here.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: And your heart is, like, reverberating.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Right. And this show is called the Big Bay Boom. It's the biggest on the West Coast, but this show is so well-coordinated.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Woo!

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Wow.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: That was a -- that was a big boom.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yes.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Look at that.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: And you know, we were kind of concerned because of the cloud cover.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: It came in.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yes.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: And then it went out.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: It's the Big Bay Boom fireworks show, bursting color over the San Diego Bay right now.You can hear it. You can see it. We can feel it. Amazing view tonight. It is far from over.

utterances.speaker: RZEZNIK
utterances.sentences: Yes! Milwaukee! Thank you so much! You are amazing!

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: That was fantastic. And look at the crowd. They just loved -- and we're singing the songs, too. You don't want to hear us singing it, but we're singing it.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Great performance from Goo Goo Dolls and this firework show.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Off the chain.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Literally cheering and applauding from us and from the people who are now walking along the seawall to head home.But this has just been fantastic.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Absolutely spectacular. We couldn't ask for better weather. I couldn't ask for better company.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Aww, likewise.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Thank you.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: But no, this has been great.I mean, the fireworks show that's been put on here -- and you see this one, right? There are smaller fireworks on the horizon all around from people here on Coronado Island. And the little cities and communities, as well. So we've had our own pre-show before the big show here on the Bay.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Truly 360, we're getting a look. The fireworks keep on coming, of course, here on CNN. You're getting them from the comfort of your couch, to your bad, wherever you want to be --

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yes.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: -- today, including we're going to take you to Las Vegas.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Vegas, baby!

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: We're out West on this Fourth in America. Fireworks lighting up the sky over Las Vegas soon. We're bringing you the best holiday entertainment in the cities across the country from sea to shining sea.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Did I hear you say West Coast, best coast?

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: I'm saying it while I'm out here, yes.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: OK.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: While I'm here, I'm saying it.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Oh, OK, because Baltimore might be mad.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yes, you can't take that back home.

utterances.speaker: KEY
utterances.sentences: Let's get louder!(MUSIC: YELLOWCARD, "OCEAN AVENUE")

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Yellowcard, doing the darn thing. OK?

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: There was a guy dressed as a drum major in that crowd. And if your band can get somebody to come dressed as a drum major, you're doing it right.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: You are doing it correctly.The band just, by the way, celebrated 20 years since their landmark album, "Ocean Avenue." You can catch them on tour with Third Eye Blind, another great band.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yes. We were watching Vegas.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Vegas.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Their show. And the Sphere, which is fantastic.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Is that a diamond, because I was like, I need that.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: It looked a little Epcot-y.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: It did.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Was it just me?

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: No.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Once we got the flag back now, and we saw the old Vegas signs there. Two point eight billion dollars spent on this. Look at that.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Oh, that's cool.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: That's just fantastic. And of course, it's a music venue, as well; 366 feet tall, right there on the Vegas Strip.And we saw the fireworks show from Caesars around it. You know, you incorporate this, you've got something.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: It's so wild. You do. I think the Grateful Dead just -- they are still there playing. But this thing is so distracting in a good way.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yes. SIDNER

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: It is a huge spectacle there.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Gorgeous.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: And things.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: And we just got done with a huge spectacle here. And coming up, you get to see another spectacle from San Francisco, the fireworks there, along with a performance by singer-songwriter Radio (ph) Roberts. And a first on CNN's "Fourth in America," fireworks in Guam, y'all.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: I'm looking forward to this. Looking forward to it.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: We are back with the Fourth in America on CNN as fireworks soaring over the San Francisco Bay. I love y'all, Yay [SIC] Area.The night is young here on the West Coast, and we have a lot more music and holiday celebrations to share with you.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Come on, Reyna Roberts, killing it. That was wonderful.Now, you know, this is a highlight for me. I love listening to her. I like country music.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yes.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: I mean, she's had a big year.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Huge.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: She was on the "Blackbirds" [SIC] track on --

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Huge.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: -- on "Cowboy Carter."

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: So good.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yes. And those were her first really breakthrough hits, "Stomping Grounds" and "Raised Right." And she killed it tonight. So fantastic performance from her.Also, if you saw the fireworks from San Francisco, we saw the set for the fireworks from Guam.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Guam.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: The U.S. naval base there. First time for our show. And Alaska.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: OK. So here's the thing. Alaska, we need to -- we need to give you -- sometimes you just come to the West Coast, be closer so you can see it at night. Because it is daylight, basically, at night.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: They're low on dark hours --

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: They only get, like, ten minutes.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: -- this time of year.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: This year -- time of year. So Alaska, you could see them, kind of.OK, see? I mean, you've got people out there with the fire. Alaska is beautiful, no matter what time of year. But I mean --

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Light a fire, bring a blanket. Look at it at dusk, at best.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Exactly.All right. As the party keeps going in San Francisco and around -- Alaska, still going a little bit.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: We've got a lot of shows going on.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: A lot of things going on. Our live Fourth of July coverage continues with another song from Ben Platt and a look at the best fireworks of the night. It's going to be a doozy. We're back in a moment.(COMMERCIAL BREAK)

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: We are back with the light show over Phoenix, Arizona, one of the capers (ph) to this eye-popping night of fireworks on this Fourth of July. Actually, that's San Diego.[00:55:05] Look, I mean, it's still sparkly up -- there you go. There are some of the gorgeous fireworks we've been seeing all night long.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: And we've got more music for you, too. Another song from Grammy and Tony Award-winning vocalist and actor Ben Platt.(MUSIC: BEN PLATT, "YOUR SMILING FACE")

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: That was fantastic. We are -- we are savoring the glorious sounds and the views from here in San Diego, which are brought you by our photographer behind us, Tom Larson.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Yes.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: David Legg (ph) has been showing you these incredible pictures of all of the fireworks just behind us.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: Huge fireworks here.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: Gorgeous. We've had such a wonderful crew. Meredith (ph) and Eileen (ph). I mean, they have been killing it.We're just having fun.

utterances.speaker: BLACKWELL
utterances.sentences: We're having fun.

utterances.speaker: SIDNER
utterances.sentences: They're doing the work.
